channel.title: Programmings on Denis Labrecque
channel.description: Recent content in Programmings on Denis Labrecque

item.title: Receptus Application
item.description: A fast, offline Bible browser that allows easy reading and search. Includes the King James Version, Young’s Literal Translation, Louis Segond, and French Darby translations of the Bible.

item.title: Warglobe Game
item.description: Eventually, Warglobe is to become an independently developed, free-to-play game with online combat in ships, airplanes, and vehicles. If possible, players will command groups of vehicles as well as drive them, combining the action and speed of a first-person shooter with the tactics of a real-time strategy game. Nevertheless, this depends on all previous phases (prototype, mission-based, and online multiplayer) being completed first.
